input_args.passage: 'Elie Wiesel – Biographical - NobelPrize.org | Mellon Professor in the Humanities at Boston University where he teaches “Literature of Memory.” Chairman of the United States Holocaust Memorial Council from ...'
input_args.claim: 'On the other hand, Elie Wiesel is noted as a Mellon Professor in the Humanities at Boston University, where he teaches “Literature of Memory” and has also served as the Chairman of the United States Holocaust Memorial Council.'
